public class TableProperties
extends Object

POJO that contains all the table-specific properties.

initProperties

public void initProperties(Properties properties)

setProperty

public void setProperty(String key,
                        String value)
Update a property. Called if a prop tag is present in a table tag. Only the current table is affected.

Parameters:
key - The property's key to update.
value - The property's value to use.

Returns:

isValidProperty

public Boolean isValidProperty(String property)
Check if the parameter exists as a property being part of the configuration properties file.

Parameters:
property - The property to check.
Returns:
true if it exists, false otherwise.

getBaseUrl

public String getBaseUrl()
Returns:
The base URL that will be used to override the scripts, stylesheets and export links.

getCompressorClassName

public String getCompressorClassName()
Returns:
the default compressor class name.

isCompressorEnable

public Boolean isCompressorEnable()
Returns:
true if the compression is enabled (the value must be "true"), false otherwise.

getCompressorMode

public CompressorMode getCompressorMode()
Returns:
the compressor mode.

getCompressorMunge

public Boolean getCompressorMunge()
Returns:
the compressor munge option.

getCompressorPreserveSemi

public Boolean getCompressorPreserveSemi()
Returns:
true to preserve semi-colons, even if it's not necessary (if the next character is a right-curly), false otherwise.

getCompressorDisableOpti

public Boolean getCompressorDisableOpti()

According to the YUI JavaScriptCompressor class, micro optimizations concern :

  • object member access : Transforms obj["foo"] into obj.foo whenever possible, saving 3 bytes
  • object litteral member declaration : Transforms 'foo': ... into foo: ... whenever possible, saving 2 bytes

Returns:
true to disable micro optimizations, false otherwise.

isAggregatorEnable

public Boolean isAggregatorEnable()
Returns:
true if the aggregation is enabled (the value must be "true"), false otherwise.

getAggregatorMode

public AggregatorMode getAggregatorMode()
Returns:
the aggregator mode.

getExportTypes

public List<ExportType> getExportTypes()
Extract the authorized export types.

Returns:
a list of authorized ExportType.
